name: Mary Tyler Moore
spouse: Dick Meeker (1955–1961) Grant Tinker (1962–1981), Robert Levine (1983–present)
emmyawards: Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series
sagawards: Screen Actors Guild Life Achievement Award
goldenglobeawards: Best Actress – Television Series Musical or Comedy, 1970: ''The Mary Tyler Moore Show'' ,  Best Actress – Motion Picture Drama, 1980: ''Ordinary People''
